descriptions.content: tshogs mchod [TBRC T330]; tshogs kyi ‘khor lo, tshogs ‘khor = circle of mass offerings; dpa’ bo ston mo = feast of dakas. Ex: Phyag rdor gtum chen tshogs mchod (W1254), Tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang dpa' bo'i ston mo'i lag len gyi cho ga bde chen rnam rol (W1793), Sgrol ma’i sgo nas tshogs ‘khor (W7344).
